marklogic.body: OH LOOK THERE GOES A PINK ELEPHANTDOES ANYONE BELIEVE THE CONDEMS ANYMORE CASH FOR THE RICH TAX FOR GRANNYS HE CAN'T BLAG YET MORE OF DISABLED PEOPLE HE'S ALREADY BLED THEM DRYSOON THE CABINET ETONAIANS WILL BE THE ONLY ONES LEFT WITH ANY MONEY.THE BUDGET WAS A PATHETICÂ MISSE OPPORTUNITY FROM A GOVERNMENT ENGAGED IN AUSTERITY FOR THOSE AT THE BOTTOM OF THE FOOD CHAIN AND BOUNTY FOR THE SHARKS AT THE TOP.
